subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Help needed

full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_003B_01C9F88D.500FCDE0

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

You have to use audio editing software to clip out the EVP an save it to a =
new file. If you have this type of software, you can listen to it looped th=
rough that. 

Windows Media Player is just a player.

  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: iankerry@... 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
=
  Sent: Sunday, June 28, 2009 3:37 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Help needed
=





  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrot=
e:
  >
  > Yes. Beside the Stop button (Square), there is a button with a l=
ittle arrow going in a circle. Press that. That is the repeat play button.
=
  > 
  > ----- Original Message ----- 
  > From: iankerry@... 
  > To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  > Sent: Sunday, June 28, 2009 8:53 AM
  > Subject: [=
EVP-ITC] Help needed
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > Is it possible to repeat =
an evp message in windows media player?
  >Thanks for that, but i mean not =
repeating the whole file,repeating the message on the file..If that makes s=
ense?
